meta.tagline: See the patterns that shape your connections
meta.defaultTitle: Understand Your Relationship Patterns & Inner World
meta.defaultDescription: Withinly helps you recognize the patterns behind how you connect — with yourself and with others. Grounded in attachment theory, love languages, and mindfulness, it turns psychology into personal reflections you can actually feel.
meta.keywords: self-awareness, relationships, personal growth, emotional intelligence, attachment theory, love languages, mindfulness, conflict patterns

hero.headline: See the patterns that shape your relationships
hero.subheadline: Discover how you attach, love, and respond to closeness and conflict — in language that finally makes sense.
hero.tagline: You’re not broken — you’re patterned. Patterns can be understood.

hook.headline: Do these feel familiar?
hook.description: Withinly turns these patterns into words you can use — no labels, no quick fixes, just clear recognition.
bullets: You pull away when someone needs closeness
You give advice when comfort was needed
You wonder if you’re too much — or not enough
hook.quote: It’s not about what’s wrong with you. It’s about understanding what makes sense about you.

howItWorks.headline: Understand yourself at your own pace
howItWorks.subheadline: Reflection unfolds step by step. Each layer connects to the next, and your AI companion remembers your patterns so you can notice them in daily life.

atAGlance.title: At a glance
items: No labels or diagnoses — just recognition
Private by default (even with partner sync)
Free to start; pay only when you go deeper

step1.title: Notice your patterns
step1.description: Short, psychology-informed questions reveal how you connect and relate to yourself.

step2.title: Get your first reflection
step2.description: A personal narrative weaves your signals into something coherent. See why you react the way you do.

step3.title: Talk it through
step3.description: Your AI companion reflects your patterns back in real situations — like a wise friend.

step4.title: Go deeper when ready
step4.description: Unlock richer portraits on conflict, trust, and communication — or explore how your patterns meet with a partner.

insight.title: Your pace is the right pace
insight.description: Some days you’ll dive deep; other days you’ll just check in. Withinly adapts and remembers where you’ve been.

whyWithinly.headline: Why Withinly

items.title: Recognition, not labels
items.description: Language you can feel and use, without boxes.

items.title: Deeper than a quiz, lighter than therapy
Grows with you
items.description: From your first reflection to deeper portraits — at your pace.

whyWithinly.tagline: You don’t need fixing — you deserve understanding.

items.quote: I’ve been in therapy for years. This gave me insights my therapist and I are exploring together.
items.author: Early member

items.quote: The report on my relationship patterns made me cry — the good kind. I felt seen.
items.author: Beta tester

items.quote: It’s like a wise friend who remembers every conversation and helps me see the threads.
items.author: Premium member

couples.headline: See how your patterns meet
couples.subheadline: One link. Two private spaces. One shared map.
couples.description1: Sync with your partner to see where you align, where you miss, and how to meet in the middle.

coupleSnapshots.title: Couple Insights
coupleSnapshots.description: Start with a free glimpse. Unlock deeper insights together if you're ready.

testimonial.quote: We stopped asking who’s right and started noticing our rhythm. Naming our patterns took the heat out of conflict and gave us a way to meet in the middle.
testimonial.author: Maya & Luis

highlights: Private by default — only shared insights are visible
One purchase unlocks couple insights for both partners
Actionable guidance that helps you meet in the middle

pricing.headline: Fair exchange for meaningful insights

free.title: Free to Start
features: Try conversations with your AI companion

premium.title: Pay as You Go with Sparks ✨
features: Sparks are tokens for deeper insights
Dive into detailed portraits when you're ready
Only pay for what matters to you

pricing.tagline: Pricing announced at launch. No subscriptions required — just pay for insights that matter.

earlyAccess.headline: Be among the first to see your patterns clearly
earlyAccess.description: We're opening Withinly to a small early group. Join our closed beta and be among the first to explore.
earlyAccess.urgency: No commitment. No pressure. Just gentle recognition of who you already are.

signup.headline: Ready to understand your patterns?
signup.description: Join the waitlist and be first to know when we open.
signup.privacy: We’ll send a personal note when doors open. No spam — ever.

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. Withinly is a reflection tool — like a mirror for your patterns. It's about recognition, not treatment. If you're in crisis, please seek professional help.

items.question: What if I'm single?
items.answer: Perfect. Understanding yourself before your next relationship is one of the best ways to grow. You don't need a partner to use Withinly.

items.question: How private is this?
items.answer: Your reflections stay yours. Even in partner sync, only shared insights are visible — never your private answers or chats.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Starting reflections are free. If you want to go deeper, you'll use Sparks (credits). In beta, pricing is flexible while we learn from users — you won't have to commit to subscriptions.
